overview: After returning home from a restful camping adventure, four friends discover that the world they left just a short time ago, has changed forever. While they were safely away in the woods, a disaster has effected the world they left behind. They soon find that they will be lodging fight for their very survival, against the living dead!  Shot and edited entirely on VHS, it is Ireland's first zombie movie.
tagline: They came from the grave... Now they're going back!
title: Zombie Genocide
